resources.string: Im an IT student currently in my final year of my master\'s. I have been developing games and interactive apps for mobile devices in Unity during my internship in Brazil. Before that I made an app called Alertside in Android studio and released it on Google Play. I have also contributed 3D models to Dota2 workshop. My bachelor\'s thesis was covering a topic about parallel processing on GPU using CUDA. Right now I would like to continue developing for Android. Im looking for a company with a driven team which share the same values and at the same time have clear solid strategy for the developed product.
Thesis: Terrain generation on the GPU Implementation and comparison of algorithms generating random height maps resembling real terrain using CPU and GPU variants.
Currently studying in field Service Science, Management, and Engineering.
3D modelling of ingame assets, level design, creation and animation of 3D assets for interactive book, programing modules for inhouse development tool Unify.
Java / Android, C / Cuda, Git, Photoshop, ZBrush, Cinema4D, Unity

I \'ve developed own app for web api data retrieval. Used service class for repeated querying and multiple fragments for showing data status. The app was published on Google Play and had over 200 downloads and about quarter of that were active users. Later however the data changed and the info which it provided was not very beneficial anymore, so I have taken it down. Since I have created this app from scratch all by myself, it has proven to be a very hard and tedious task, but on the other hand it gave me a lot of experience.

Completed course about Heterogeneous Parallel Programming and received satement of accomplishement with distinction in 2013 - http://bit.ly/1DMVmJa\nDone bachelor\'s thesis using Visual Studio with Nvidia Nsight.
